alert.note: Alert for Lower Jefferson; St. Charles; St. John The Baptist; Upper Jefferson; Upper Lafourche (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 10 at 10:53AM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central St. John The Baptist, St. Charles, northeastern Lafourche and northwestern Jefferson Parishes through 1130 AM CDT... At 1052 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Luling, or 7 miles southwest of Avondale, moving northwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Avondale, Hahnville, Metairie, Jefferson, Harahan, Jean Lafitte, Montz, Luling, River Ridge, Boutte, Ama, Destrehan, St. Rose, Killona, Norco, Paradis, Elmwood, Des Allemands, Lafitte and Bayou Gauche. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 213 and 227. Interstate 310 between mile markers 1 and 11. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Lower Jefferson; St. Charles; St. John The Baptist; Upper Jefferson; Upper Lafourche
